attributes.action: Introduction of a Vehicle Identification Card, 'VIC', to replace outdated Road Taxing methods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'VIC' replaces outdated road tax methods yet it contains NO personal details only the vehicle owners name and contact number. However it does contain details of valid Insurance and MOT - (where required).

Petrol stations are upgraded to have a 'go / no go' card reader installed on each fuel pump rendering an invalid vehicle useless without petrol if the documentation on 'VIC' is not in date.
 
BENEFITS ......

Everybody using roads will pay their way and the ones using the roads the most will pay the most.

The charge at the pumps can be adjusted to the area in which the vehicle are being driven, thereby effectively making congestion charging redundant.

Most importantly - ALL VEHICLES will have be legal to use the roads.

And the benefits linked to that are endless.
